reservations.title: Reservations:
reservations.description: You choose the bike you like by calling our manager or writing to us via social media.

delivery.title: Delivery:
delivery.description: We deliver the motorcycle and helmets to you, conclude an agreement on the spot, and you pay a deposit and payment for renting the vehicle.

technical.title: Technical inspection:
technical.description: We deliver the motorcycle and helmets to you, conclude an agreement on the spot, and you pay a deposit and payment for renting the vehicle.

return.title: Return:
return.description: At the end of the rental period, we contact you, our employee picks up the motorcycle at a place convenient for you, and also returns the deposit after inspecting the condition of the vehicle.
